entry.title: To give migrants the same housing and other benefits as urban hukou holders, and to build a prope...
entry.content:
Reshared post from



To give migrants the same housing and other benefits as urban hukou holders, and to build a proper social safety-net will be expensive. And if more tax is the solution, then the middle class could well begin demanding a greater political say.

China's future: Rising power, anxious state - The Economist: Full print edition
